inline.description:
Custom emoji - delete emoji after using in post

1. Post a custom emoji in a channel
2. Click on Main Menu > Custom Emoji
3. Click "Delete" beside the custom emoji name
4. Press Enter in confirmation modal
5. Refresh
6. Go back and observe the channel the emoji was posted in
inline.expectedResult: Emoji is removed from the list and only text renders in the channel (instead of the emoji that was previously shown)
